name: Erinyes
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t silvered

traits.Hellish Weapons: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 (3d8) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).
traits.Magic Resistance: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7+1d8 + 3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14+1d8 + 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. The poison lasts until it is removed by the lesser restoration spell or similar magic.
